report.title: Gentle Yet VERY Visual
report.author: The Grifter
report.bodytext: It was Sunday nite in Las Vegas and I decided to stay in my 4 Queens hotel room. /n /n T+ 0Hr, Drop 12mg encapsulated. Buzzed at T+30min. /n /n T+ 1Hr, I drop another 10mg. /n /n T+ 2Hr, I drop my final 10mg. Almost instantaneously my X type experience shifts gears. Within 30 more minutes I have pleasantly discovered that the Foxy (we call it DiPT, as in 'wanna get DiPT?') effects blossom exponentially beyond 20mg. /n /n T+ 3Hr, I am at the level of a 200mcg+ LSD trip and still climbing - very visual yet gentle, NOT overpowering. /n /n T+ 4Hr, still peaking. /n /n T+ 5Hr, still peaking at the equivalent effects of nearly 300mcg LSD. /n /n T+ 6Hr, still experiencing a slow-sustained peak. /n /n T+ 7Hr, still in the sustained peak, but I have passed the apex. /n /n T+ 9Hr, slowly dimishing BUT quite high by normal reality standards. /n /n T+ 12Hr, back to baseline. /n /n I am pleased to discover that getting DiPT at 30mg+ (staggered 1/3 per hour ramp) is BETTER than P. cubensis and more like LSD in many ways - contrary to previous reports the 'FoxyDiPT' is NOT a 'mild semi-psychedelic' it is a FULL BLOWN psychedelic with a unique gentleness and very visual signature. /n /n You've been stoned, dosed, even ripped - now get 'DiPT!'
